title: Blended Learning Design Strategies for Online Higher Distance Education

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level mathematics fundamentals and college-level major-specific basic concepts
context.additional_context: Mathematics course conducted in a smartphone-based learning environment, emphasizing practical application skills for non-degree-seeking adult learners.

learning_goals: Learners can establish module-specific activity plans using online learning design (LD) tools
Learners can evaluate their own instructional design processes by applying mixed research methods (quantitative/qualitative analysis)
Learners can propose strategies for designing effective learning activities in technology-constrained environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
